review: Visited Dr Sumera for my son's treatment , and he was diagnosed with dengue. His fever came down within a week with the medications .  Dr Sumera was constantly was in touch with me during this time as she had concern for the patient, even during her leave she guided me regarding  the right diet. It's really very kind of her and I have no words to express my gratitude to her. üòäüôè

I got to know about Dr.sumera from one of my office colleague  , I then had taken an appointment for my twin nephews  From the moment we stepped into the clinic, the warm and inviting atmosphere put both us and our kids at ease.The clinic is well-maintained, and appointments are efficiently scheduled, minimising wait times.We appreciate the time taken to explain medical information in a way that's easy to understand . Highly recommended for top-notch pediatric care !! ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è

We are incredibly grateful for Dr. Sumera and the exceptional care provided at her clinic. Dr. Sumera combines medical expertise with genuine compassion, creating a warm and comforting environment for our children. Their dedication to open communication and involving parents in decision-making sets them apart. Our family is thankful for the positive and reassuring experiences during each visit.

I am incredibly grateful for the exceptional care that my child receives from Dr. Sumera Janvekar.  From routine check-ups to addressing unexpected concerns, she always goes above and beyond, ensuring both the physical and emotional well-being of my child. The welcoming atmosphere and child-friendly environment create a positive experience for both parents and little ones. I wholeheartedly recommend Dr. Sumera Janvekar to any parent seeking a trustworthy and dedicated pediatrician.

*** ****** ** ** *** *** **** ************ **** **** ******* A very well informed doctor, who really knows her way around kids. We went in with our daughter having high fever, and the treatment brought her back to normal in no time. Also, Dr. Sumera was kind enough to answer our questions on whatsapp every now and then, which really helped us ease our minds. Thanks Dr. Sumera for being so kind and patient with us!

Dr. Sumera is the kindest and most warm hearted doctor i have come across. She treated our son like her own. I highly recommend her. Her patience is something which a lot of other doctors lack nowadays.The treatment suggested by her was also fabulous.

We consulted Dr Sumera for my 4 years old daughter. She kept having cold , chest congestion and high temperature frequently. She used to develop ear pain and other symptoms always . Doctor was very good in diagnosing the root cause and recommended us the right remedy. Best thing was she was very good in handling my daughter ( its a tough task generally) and prescribed only adequate medication for her. I would highly recommend Dr Sumera whenever your kids need medical advice and treatment
New to the city and needed a doctor urgently. She helped us in no time and was available on calls and messages. Her consultation and medication was on point. She is now my go to doctor!
Dr. Sumera is an amazing doctor. Very happy to take consultation from her.  I would strongly recommend her in case you are looking for a genuine doctor.
Dr Sumera treated my son for acne. He had these problem from quite sometime. It worked very well for my son. Doctor is very patient and humble, addressed all my questions. Highly recommended her.

Definitely recommend her as a pediatrician.

Dr. Sumera as a pediatrician who genuinely cares about the well-being of children. Dr Sumera Janvekar knows her way around pediatrics very well . Her clinical skills both with the patient and parents is remarkable .  She answered all our questions in a very understandable lay man's language .  Her counselling skills make the  parents feel very safe .

Consulted Dr Sumera for a health check up for my son. My son had symptoms of fever, cough and cold. The doctor exactly knew how to calm a worried parent. She was extremely friendly and was patient enough to answer all my questions. 

Would highly recommend Dr Sumera.
Great doctor! Loved the way she interacted and treated my nephew for cold with politeness and compassion

I consulted Dr Sumera for my neice illness. She was extremely friendly in terms of handing her patients. My neice was well treated. Dr Sumera answered politely to each every question were raised. I strong recommend her for consultations.

My kid had an accidental fall for which i consulted Dr Sumera. The doctor is very knowledgeable and friendly. She promptly attended to the emergency after which she calmly addressed all our concerns and queries. I would highly recommend her.
Incredible Paediatrician!She is wonderful and a good person. Loved her work ethics. She is soo good at work.Loved how she made my daughter comfortable with her.
